abstract.para: The MATE Control Center provides a central place for the user to setup their MATE experience. It can let you configure anything from the behavior of your window borders to the default font type.

articleinfo.releaseinfo: This manual describes version &VERSION; of the MATE Control Center.

sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: The MATE Control Center provides a single window from which to launch all preference tools.
To launch the MATE Control Center, type mate-control-center in a terminal window.
For help on using preference tools, see the User Guide.

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: The MATE Control Center shows icons for all preference tools installed on your system in a window. Select a preference tool to see its description in the status bar.
To open a preference tool, double-click on its icon.
